title: [Medicine] A single-dose intranasal ChAd vaccine protects upper and lower respiratory tracts against SARS-CoV-2, inducing high levels of neutralizing antibodies and virtually completely prevents COVID-19 infection in both the upper and lower respiratory tracts in mice. (Cell, PDF, 19 August 2020)
[Health] Allied Bioscience creates a product that will help minimize the spread of COVID-19
